Sentencas: Energy storage is vital for the energy transition, enabling reliable power grids based on intermittent renewables.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: Reversible solid oxide cell (rSOC) technology is promising for seasonal energy storage.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: The novel finding from this work is that optimised air recirculation for rSOC in endothermic electrolyser mode leads to efficiency being nearly independent of current density.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: Thereby the operating region of highest efficiency is expanded from the thermoneutral point to the entire endothermic region, leading to highly efficient part load operation.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: Air recirculation increases fuel cell mode efficiency too, particularly at higher loads.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: This widens the efficient operating window in both modes.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: These findings emerge from a thermodynamic study of an rSOC-based energy storage system with ammonia as fuel.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: A process design is developed and optimised for efficiency, supported with detailed exergy analysis.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: First, ammonia synthesis subsystem integrated with the rSOC system in electrolyser mode is optimised.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: Second, rSOC outlet air recirculation is optimised for high system efficiency.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: Finally, rSOC operating points are optimised for highest round-trip efficiency.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: We find the least exergy destruction for the ammonia synthesis subsystem at 170 bar synthesis pressure and 30 degrees C condensation temperature (without needing refrigeration).
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia

Sentencas: The overall system achieves round-trip efficiencies up to 60.3%.
Titulo: Hot air recirculation enlarges efficient operating window of reversible solid oxide cell systems: A thermodynamic study of energy storage using ammonia
